titleStmt.title: Hugh Peters's passing-bell rung out in a letter to him from one that hath been an accurate observer of Hugh Peters and Oliver Cromwells bloody actions. Justice hath leaden feet, but iron hands. T.V.
titleStmt.author: T. V.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed in the first year of his Majesties restauration and his kingdoms libertie from tyranny and oppression,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the first year of his Majesties restauration
